powergrid.control.uicontrols

Class Noticeboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.control.uicontrols.Noticeboard

  • public class Noticeboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles interaction with the Noticeboard, such as opening and closing the Noticeboard and opening a specific Tab.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Noticeboard.Tab
      This class represents a Tab of the Noticeboard.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Noticeboard.Tab ACHIEVEMENTS
      Tab object that represents the "Achievements" Tab on the Noticeboard

      Tab object that represents the "Featured" Tab on the Noticeboard
      static Noticeboard.Tab MINIGAMES
      Tab object that represents the "Minigames" Tab on the Noticeboard
      static Noticeboard.Tab[] noticeboardTabs
      Contains all values of the five tabpanels from the Noticeboard.
      static Noticeboard.Tab QUESTS
      Tab object that represents the "Quests" Tab on the Noticeboard

    • Field Detail

      • FEATURED

        public static final Noticeboard.Tab FEATURED

      • MINIGAMES

        public static final Noticeboard.Tab MINIGAMES
        Tab object that represents the "Minigames" Tab on the Noticeboard

      • noticeboardTabs

        public static final Noticeboard.Tab[] noticeboardTabs
        Contains all values of the five tabpanels from the Noticeboard. Each of the values is described below;

        • Index 0, Value 190, Description: Quest tab.
        • Index 1, Value 917, Description: Achievements tab.
        • Index 2, Value 1343, Description: Challenges tab.
        • Index 3, Value 1344, Description: Minigames tab.
        • Index 4, Value 1345, Description: Featured tab.

    • Method Detail

      • openTab

        public static boolean openTab(Noticeboard.Tab tab)
        Opens the given Tab of the Noticeboard.

        This method may require somewhere between 2 and 5 seconds to complete. If the required Tab was not opened during this time, this method returns false.

        Parameters:
        tab - the Tab to open
        Returns:
        true if the Tab was opened, false otherwise

      • getCurrentTab

        public static Noticeboard.Tab getCurrentTab()
        returns the currently opened Tab.

        Returns:
        the currently opened Tab

      • open

        public static void open()
        Ensures that the Noticeboard is visible.

        This is a convenience method for WigetManager.openNoticeboard().
